ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault Construction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the building of Vault walls and doors, including larger manual vault doors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault Power Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the building of Vault reactors and batteries, large efficient power production and storage.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault Defence Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the building of an insectoid thumper, which deters insectoid infestations as long as it remains powered.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault Comms Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the building of a macro comms console, which doubles as an orbital beacon using the home zone to find tradeable items instead of a small radius around it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault Environmental Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the building of vault temperature control networks, piped heating and cooling.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault Furniture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the building of vault furniture, including self powered lighting and wall mounted utilities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vault Armoury
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the crafting of vaulter apparel and weapons at the vault workbench.
